title: How Mike Vrabel used dirty washcloths to convey Patriots culture that has helped them to the Super Bowl

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: How Mike Vrabel used dirty washcloths to convey Patriots culture that has helped them to the Super Bowl
sources.description: He has reinvigorated a struggling franchise with a level of culture-building at which many franchises only dream, and Vrabel has demonstrated joy so widely that his coaches view it as part of his identity.
